sentence.Network_en: The identical treatment of such dissimilar items is totally illogical.
sentence.Network_cn: 对如此不同的东西用一模一样的处理方法是完全不合逻辑的。

sentence.Network_en: It is illogical to oppose the repatriation of economic migrants.
sentence.Network_cn: 反对把经济移民遣送归国是不合逻辑的。

sentence.Network_en: She has an illogical fear of insects.
sentence.Network_cn: 她毫无道理地害怕昆虫。

entry.tran: 不合逻辑的;有悖逻辑的
entry.def: If you describe an action, feeling, or belief as illogical, you are critical of it because you think that it does not result from a logical and ordered way of thinking.

example.ex: It is illogical to oppose the repatriation of economic migrants...
example.tran: 反对把经济移民遣送归国是不合逻辑的。

example.ex: She may think your reaction is crazy or illogical, but she cannot deny what you are feeling.
example.tran: 她可能觉得你的反应疯狂或者不合逻辑,但她不会否认你的感受。

sentences.sentence: "a confused dream about the end of the world"

auth_sentence.content: I think its illogical not to question your government.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think its illogical not to question your government.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think its illogical not to question your government.

auth_sentence.content: When will people give up on this illogical argument?
auth_sentence.res_content: When will people give up on this illogical argument?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When will people give up on this illogical argument?

auth_sentence.content: Kim calls North Korea's provocation assertion totally illogical.
auth_sentence.res_content: Kim calls North Korea's provocation assertion totally illogical.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Kim calls North Korea's provocation assertion totally illogical.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"使……,成为,进入,再"; 2. 放在同辅音词根前表示"不,无"

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不,无+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
il不,无+liberal宽大的→adj.气量狭窄的,吝啬的
il不,无+licit合法的, 正当的→adj.违法的,违禁的
il不,无+literate有文化的→adj.不识字的
il不,无+logical逻辑的→adj.不合逻辑的
il使……,成为,进入,再+lus玩弄+ion表名词→被[幻觉]玩弄→幻觉
il使……,成为,进入,再+lumin光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明
il使……,成为,进入,再+lustr=lust光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明

means.word_mean: 没有道理的,不合逻辑的

sentences.en: It is clearly illogical to maintain such a proposition.
sentences.cn: 坚持这种主张显然是没有道理的。

sentences.en: Although strictly illogical, Martin’s interpretation of this paradox seems the best.
sentences.cn: 马丁对于这一悖论的解释尽管严格说来不合乎逻辑，卻似乎是最好的解释了。
